comment: A constant function is a continuous function on ` CC ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Moved into main set.mm as ~ cncfmptc and may be deleted by mathbox owner, JM. --MC 12-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
